name: Breaking in the New Year!
description:
With 2022 coming to a close that made me start to think about New Year's resolutions and reminded me that I had for one this year. Make and release a small game, something I've never done on my own. So after about a week of development here's Breaking in the New Year!! A short arcade style game where you clear out bricks to help bring in the New Year.

It's a very simple game that I may update in the future with some additional polish, quality of life features, and platforms to play it on.

Until then, I hope you have fun with it and that you have a Happy New Year!!!
